file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-26-11-04 - ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT PROTECTIVE SHIELD - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT PROTECTIVE SHIELD - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: A/C WITH AVIONICS PROTECTIVES INSTALLED 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the avionics protectives. B. The avionics protectives are installed in the forward electronic compartment. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ONLY A/C WITH AVIONICS PROTEC- 21-26-11-000-801-A AVIONICS PROTECTIVE - REMOVAL TIVES INSTALLED ONLY A/C WITH AVIONICS PROTEC- 21-26-11-400-801-A AVIONICS PROTECTIVE - INSTALLATION TIVES INSTALLED EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-26-11 Page 1 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-26-11-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ONLY A/C WITH AVIONICS PROTECTIVES INSTALLED 2. AVIONICS PROTECTIVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the avionics protectives. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION LH side of the Forward Electronic Com- 113/213 113AZ/113CZ partment RH side of the Forward Electronic Com- 114/214 114BZ partment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Plastic or wooden spatula To remove remaining adhesive tapes 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Inside the Forward Electronic Compart- 1 Does the task ment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove access panels 113AZ and 114BZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Open door 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-26-11 Page 2 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the adhesives tapes (15) and (16). Refer to Sheet 3, VIEW F and VIEW G. (2) Cut and remove the tiedown straps (17) and (18). Refer to Sheet 4, DET. H and DET. J. (3) Remove the nut (22), screw (19), washers (21), spacer (23) and clamp (20). Refer to Sheet 4, DET. K. (4) Remove the nut (27), screw (24), washers (26) and the clamp (25). Refer to Sheet 4, DET. L. (5) Loosen the clamps (13) and remove the drain hoses (14) from the avionics protective (REF.). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. E. (6) Remove the screws (10), washers (11) and clamps (12). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. D. (7) Remove the nuts (9), screws (6), washers (7) and supports (8). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. C. (8) Remove the screws (3), washers (4) and supports (2). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. B. (9) Remove the avionics protective (1). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. B. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-26-11 Page 3 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

SCREW STRAP 26. WASHER 25. CLAMP DRAIN HOSE DRAIN HOSE (REF.) (REF.) DET. H 26. WASHER 27. NUT DET. L DRAIN HOSE (REF.) 19. SCREW 21. WASHER 23. SPACER 20. CLAMP 18. TIEDOWN STRAP DET. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-26-11-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ONLY A/C WITH AVIONICS PROTECTIVES INSTALLED 3. AVIONICS PROTECTIVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the avionics protectives. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION LH side of the Forward Electronic Com- 113/213 113AZ/113CZ partment RH side of the Forward Electronic Com- 114/214 114BZ partment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) KB42/75 Adhesive Tape AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Inside the Forward Electronic Compart- 1 Does the task ment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the avionics protectives (1) in position. Refer to Sheet 2, DET. B. (2) Install the supports (2), washers (4) and screws (3). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. B. (3) Put the avionics protectives (5) in position. Refer to Sheet 2, DET. C. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-26-11 Page 8 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Install the support (8), washers (7), screws (6) and nuts (9). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. C. (5) Put the avionics protectives in position. Refer to Sheet 2, DET. D. (6) Install the clamps (12), washers (11) and screws (10). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. D. (7) Connect the drain hoses (14) to the avionics protectives and tighten the clamp (13). Refer to Sheet 2, DET. E. (8) Apply the adhesives tape at positions (15) and (16). Refer to Sheet 3, VIEW F and VIEW G. (9) Install tiedown straps at positions (17) and (18). Refer to Sheet 4, DET. H and DET. J. (10) Install the clamp (20), washers (21), screw (19), spacer (23) and nut (22). Refer to Sheet 4, DET. K. (11) Install the clamp (25), washers (26), screws (24) and nut (27). Refer to Sheet 4, DET. L. J. Follow-on (Figure 401) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install access panels 113AZ and 114BZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Close door 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-26-11 Page 9 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
